item.title: Kelly add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love. I require so much!" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kelly add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Kelly add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Linda Grayson
item.description: "There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate." -- Linda Grayson

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description:
"Alice laughed. 'There's no use trying,' she said. 'One can't believe impossible things.'
I daresay you haven't had much practice,' said the Queen. 'When I was your age, I always did it for half-an-hour a day. Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast. There goes the shawl again!" -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Kelly add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kelly add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kelly add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all - in which case, you fail by default." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "If you can dream it, you can do it. Always remember that this whole thing was started with a dream and a mouse." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Walt Disney Company
item.description: "Around here, however, we don't look backwards for very long. We keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things, because we're curious...and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths." -- Walt Disney Company

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "There is more treasure in books than in all the pirates' loot on Treasure Island and best of all, you can enjoy these riches every day of your life." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Kelly add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "She believed in dreams, all right, but she also believed in doing something about them. When Prince Charming didn't come along, she went over to the palace and got him." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Kelly add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling
